title: Fragments, "La pagode sur un pont de rochers (The pagoda on a rock bridge)", ca. 1775
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved plate on plain weave foundation.
dimensions: A. Warp: 95 cm (37 1/2 in.). Weft: 24 cm (9 1/2 in.). Left selvedge present B. Warp: 87 cm (34 1/2 in.). Weft: 24 cm (9 1/2 in.). All edges cut. C. Warp: 47 cm (18 1/2 in.). Weft: 32 cm (12 1/2 in.) All edges cut D. Warp: 94 cm (37 in.). Weft: 20 cm (8 in.). All edges cut. E. Warp: 80 cm (31 1/2 in). Weft: 20 cm (8 in.). Right selvedge present. F. Warp: 80 cm (31 1/2 in.). Weft: 12.5 cm (5 in.). All edges cut.
description: Six fragments of a chinoiserie design featuring a pagoda on a rock bridge, and people taking tea. In blue on white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragments, "La pagode sur un pont de rochers (The pagoda on a rock bridge)", ca. 1775.
ca. 1775. Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved plate on plain weave foundation.. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-73-a/f.
